description: Scraper for the GA Tech HvZ website which announces its results on GroupMe

GROUPME_API_KEY.description: Your "Access Token", obtainable by logging into https://dev.groupme.com and clicking the "Access Token" button at the top-right.

FACTION_GROUP_NAME.description: The exact name of your faction's Group.

CNC_GROUP_NAME.description: The exact name of a Group containing just you. (A Group by this name will be created if you don't already have one.)
